name: Staying in Vegas
description:
You really want to visit the world outside of Vegas, but you know the old saying: "anyone unlucky enough to be in Vegas stays in Vegas". Unfortunately, you were born in Vegas, so the System will do anything for you to stay.

You have to beat other gamblers stuck in Vegas to finally earn the right to leave.

Note: The AI plays as optimally as possible, so it will often high numbers. The trick to beat the AI is to cheat with the "special" moves (the AI cannot cheat). For example, if you cheat by splitting your cards once and the AI busts, you get to do 3 times the normal damage.

Xbox Controller supported

DPad, A, B, Start

Controls - Keyboard

Arrows, A: [X], C: [C], Start: [Enter]
